class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: In this fourth course, Family Nurse Practitioner (FNP) students will continue synthesizing and appraising evidence-based guidelines for implementation of health promotion and risk reduction strategies for implementation when caring for patients across the lifespan.
prerequisites: NRSG 806D and 807D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1567, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Abiri, Status: Closed
